metadata.synopsis: One of the nurses in the Hospital
metadata.how_to_trigger: Convince the Surgeon to be operated by the nurses. Talk to them after.

0.speaker: Sister Geanne
0.text: Master. No, no. Not master. Not.
0.context: NodeContext: In weird clipped syllables and barks. Not loud, just tense

1.speaker: Sister Geanne
1.text: Cured. Be cured, he cured, we cured.
